sentences.english: The word reflects the sky Mr. quarter admiration and worship of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 青天兩字體現了季先生對青天的敬仰和崇拜。

sentences.english: Ylath never asked to be worshipped.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉斯從未尋求有人崇拜。

sentences.english: Leadership Don't get blinded by the cult-hero worshiped "Big L" leaders;
sentences.chinese: 領導能力無須盲目崇拜“大人物”領導者。

sentences.english: He enjoys pretending to be you, Sergeant.
sentences.chinese: 警官，他崇拜你，很喜歡學你。

sentences.english: It is the collapsing of the Expander that triggers the Adorer clean up code.
sentences.chinese: 這是崩潰的膨脹觸發崇拜者清理代碼。

sentences.english: Their advocacy about celebrity sometimes let youngsters become fans of so-called idols.
sentences.chinese: 他們的宣傳有時會讓年輕人陷入偶像崇拜之中。

sentences.english: Joe Cole on the new owner reveals his adulation.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾對新東家流露出崇拜之情。

sentences.english: These are things that are very common in polytheistic and pagan practices.
sentences.chinese: 這些在多神崇拜和異教行爲中很常見。

sentences.english: She was a devoted admirer of "The Dream Journey.
sentences.chinese: 她是《夢幻之旅》忠實的崇拜者。

sentences.english: She had read my work, she said; she was an admirer.
sentences.chinese: 她說她讀過我的文章，是我的崇拜者。

sentences.english: This is exactly how these jewels are meant to be adored.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼珠寶意味着被崇拜。

sentences.english: Tis the god Hercules, whom Antony loved, Now leaves him.
sentences.chinese: 這是安東尼所崇拜的赫剌克勒斯，現在離開他了。
不對，他崇拜你，無條件地。

sentences.english: Dragon is one of the most sacred figures in ancient folk tales of the Bai People.
sentences.chinese: 龍是古代白族民間傳說中最受崇拜的神靈之一。

sentences.english: The ritual displays the custom of ancestor worship of the Yi people.
sentences.chinese: 從殺年豬的儀式可以窺視到彝族原始崇拜的一角。

sentences.english: One false move and you will lose their respect and admiration forever. Here are some general rules
sentences.chinese: 一着不慎，你就可能永遠失掉他們的尊敬和崇拜。

definition: to admire/to revere/to look up to
to kneel and bow with joined hands at forehead level/to worship
to prostrate oneself in worship (idiom)/(fig.) to worship/to bow down to
